data.title: K1 Speed Expands LA County Presence, Opens Upscale Indoor Go Kart Racing Center In Burbank, CA
data.meta_description: /PRNewswire-PRWeb/ -- K1 Speed - the world's premier indoor go kart entertainment center - is excited to announce today the opening of its second Los Angeles...
data.text:
And given its close proximity to the movie and television industry, K1 Speed Burbank also provides an exciting new location for video shoots and seeks to add to the company's extensive film portfolio that includes ABC's Dancing with the Stars, Nickelodeon's JoJo Siwa, and Flo Rida's music video for the hit single "Let It Roll", plus many more.

K1 Speed Burbank features everything racers enjoy at their 45+ locations worldwide. This includes their 100% electric go karts imported from Italy. These zero-emission karts are faster than gas-powered go karts and better for both the environment and guests. Kids can enjoy the exciting speeds of their Junior Karts, while older drivers can get an adrenaline rush in their Adult Karts that approach speeds of up to 45 miles per hour - the fastest in the industry!

The indoor track is professionally designed to promote overtaking opportunities and presents a challenge to both amateurs and veteran racers alike. Lining the track are Protex karting barriers – the latest and safest barrier system on the market today. These barriers are illuminated with bright and colorful LED lights that transform the traditional go kart racing experience into something new and exciting.

K1 Speed Burbank is not just a go kart racing track, but an indoor entertainment center for the whole family! In addition to racing, families and friends can play in an arcade with the latest and most popular video games. Those looking for more retro entertainment can shoot pool at one of the several billiards tables located off track.

Visitors who need to recharge after a day of fun can appreciate the sophisticated Paddock Lounge café located onsite, that offers delicious food and beverages for all ages.

For over two decades, K1 Speed has been famous for their enormously fun parties and events – from small birthday parties to massive corporate functions. As such, K1 Speed Burbank has two private event rooms available for rent: the F1 Room and the MotoGP Room. To complete their events, both casual and formal catering options are available.

K1 Speed Burbank is open now seven days a week at 960 Chestnut Street, Burbank, CA 91506. For more information, please visit http://www.k1speed.com/burbank-location.html .

ABOUT K1 SPEED

Founded in 2003, K1 Speed is the world's largest indoor kart racing operator with over 45 centers in seven different countries and offers a unique upscale entertainment concept for casual consumers, racing enthusiasts and corporate or group events. K1 Speed is the first choice for anyone who wants to experience genuine racing in state-of-the-art European electric karts that are eco-friendly, and safety oriented while providing superior performance to traditional gas karts. Each K1 Speed location is designed as a large entertainment venue with professionally-designed tracks and cutting-edge décor showcasing authentic racing memorabilia along with ample seating and viewing areas, spacious lobbies, meeting rooms and a place to eat and drink. Additionally, K1 Speed offers franchise opportunities both in the United States and internationally.
